data.title: Speaking at META conf
data.text:
Location: peterborough
Date: 10/05/2018

I have the luck to present "I did mob programming every day for 5 months, Hereâ€™s what I learnt" at Meta - the BGL groups internal confrence on the 10th of may. The talk is based on my article of the same name (avaliable here: https://goo.gl/wLXAHH). The article is the most read on the Compare the market blog with 28,000 views.

data.title: Coach at Codebar London
data.text:
Location: London
Date: 27/03/2018

CodeBar is a event aimed at helping beginner programmers develop the skills they need to suceed. During the event I acted as a coach teaching React. you can find out more information on codebar here: https://codebar.io/
